rules_text:
Whenever this Vehicle attacks, exile the top card of defending player's library. If the exiled card is a land, create a tapped Treasure token. Otherwise, create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Crew 1
